title: Enhancing Language Education Through the Application of Learning Design Practice Cases

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education methodologies and experience in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Case study and application of learning design for improving language proficiency targeting professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze language education design cases using systematic literature review methods.
Learners can apply a DIY (Do It Yourself) learning design process through case studies.
Learners can plan formative assessments reflecting educational contexts when designing language learning activities using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
